update system_dict set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nid = #{nid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hidden_value = #{hiddenValue,jdbcType=TINYINT}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from system_dict where deleted = false and nid = #{nid}
